meta.content: The district would like to provide you with information regarding the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the district’s work to ensure the health of all our staff and students. Currently we are under a mandatory school closure through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. Access to sport facilities including the Cardinal Field Complex and Track will remain closed. If you need assistance with school lunches...

div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 10:55 am CDT

div.div: Rain. High near 52. Breezy, with a north wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New precipitation amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

Rain likely, mainly before 9pm. Cloudy, with a low around 44. Breezy, with a north northwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New precipitation amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 59. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

span.span: The district would like to provide you with information regarding the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the district’s work to ensure the health of all our staff and students. Currently we are under a mandatory school closure through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. Access to sport facilities including the Cardinal Field Complex and Track will remain closed. If you need assistance with school lunches please contact the district office at 815-938-2036, or to obtain student's belongings please contract the school office. Please click on the below links to read more information.

a.title: E-mail this article to a friend.

div.a: Forrestville Valley Recognizes Mr. Heinz, IPA-NW Region JH Principal of the Year
